parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Briefing

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Teams

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Registers a new task type. Parameters are defined in the given config class (subclass of <tt>CfgTasks</tt>)

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> teamMember '''registerTask''' entryName

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> teamMember: [[Team Member]] - [[teamMember]] [[agent]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> entryName: [[String]] - classname in <tt>CfgTasks</tt>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] - [[true]] on success

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[teamMember]] _agent [[registerTask]] "MyTask";</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[registeredTasks]], [[unregisterTask]], [[sendTask]], [[createTask]], [[currentTasks]], [[taskCompleted]]
</value></part></template>
